name: themed-wordsearch
description: Small CLI to generate themed wordsearch puzzles

scripts.publish: powershell -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force docs | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path web\* -Destination docs -Recurse -Force; git add -A; git diff --cached --quiet; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { git commit -m 'Update site' }; git push"
